verses.text: Ach co Diosal yet' val yoval a k'ool ix onh actancani. Ix onh actejcani, onh ak'ji ganar. Mamin, ak'xicot quip ticnaic.
Ix ak' ib'xoc jun lum tik, ix jatcanb'at lu'um. Ha ticnaic, macxi sjatelal lum chi', yic mantzac ib'xilaj lu'um.
Ha onh a chonhab' onh tik, niwan yaelal ix ak' quila'. Ichato te niwan vino ix ak' t'ayonh, ix q'ue t'a co jolom.
Ix ak' jun ch'oxnab'il t'a eb' niwan elk'och t'a yichanh yic wach' max yamchaj eb' yuj sjul-lab' eb' ajk'ool.
Tak'vanh t'ayonh, colonheli, yujto masanil syal uuj. Colonhcanel a onh xajanab'il onh tik uuj.
Ix loloncot Dios masanto t'a scajnub', ix yalan icha tik: Ol tzalaj in k'ool ayic ol in cotac pojanb'at lum Siquem yet' yak'lical lum Sucot.
Axo lum Galaad yet' lum Manasés wik yaj lu'um. Ha Efraín icha in q'uen xumpil yaji. Axo Judá icha sk'ocochal vopisio yaji.
Ha Moab, icha yet'tal b'aj tzin b'ic in b'a yaji. Ha t'a yib'anh Edom ol vak'canb'at in xanhab'. D'a tzalajk'olal ol in avajoc yujto ol vak' ganar eb' filisteo, xchi Dios.
Ach in Diosal ¿mach tzin ik'anb'at t'a jun chonhab' ayoch smuroal t'a spatic yichanh? ¿Mach tzin ik'anb'at t'a Edom?
Ach co Diosal, ix onh a patiquejeli. Maxtzac yal-laj a k'ol tzach b'at yet' eb' co soldado t'a oval.
Ochanh qued'oc, colonhel t'a eb' ayoch ajk'olal t'ayonh. Ha scolval eb' quetanimail t'ayonh, malaj yalani.
Ach co Diosal, a yet' a colval ol cak' ganar oval. Ha ach ol a tek'canem eb' ayoch ajk'olal t'ayonh.
